title: Recent advances on environmental application of graphene-based composites
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00340C, Tutorial Review
Rongbo Hou , Weiyu Zhu, Yanxue Yue, Jiashuo Feng, Bo Zhang, Alhadi Ishag, Yubing Sun
Graphene-based composites have been widely applied in environmental remediation due to the high removal capacity. However, the systematic reviews concerning application of graphene-based composites were not available for the last...
